channel.title: Nikhil Midda - ITWS 1100 Labs Feed
channel.description: RSS feed for ITWS 1100 lab landing pages including Lab 01 through Lab 04.

item.title: Lab 01: VM, GitHub and Azure Setup
item.description: Environment setup workflow including Azure VM, GitHub configuration, and initial deployment setup.

item.title: Lab 02: Semantic HTML Resume
item.description: Resume development using semantic HTML structure with improved styling and content organization.

item.title: Lab 03: Personal Website
item.description: Multi-page personal website with consistent layout, navigation, validation, and deployment workflow.

item.title: Lab 03b: AI-Assisted Web Development Enhancement
item.description: Five-iteration AI-assisted website enhancement project with reflection and iterative prompt refinement.

item.title: Lab 04: RSS and Atom Feeds
item.description: XML feed authoring and validation lab covering RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 feed structure and deployment checks.
